BS_NMSP::UserTypeBase

BS_NMSP::UserTypeBase Struct Reference

Base class for users to derive their object types from. More...

#include <bsCore.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

EmitTypeControl * __ft

Detailed Description

Base class for users to derive their object types from.

bulletscript lets users use their own structures, for maximum flexibility and speed/size. The only concession is that they include a pointer to an EmitTypeControl, which is used by bulletscript to control the object.
